title: Sequence labelling project shows blank annotation screen
body:
How to reproduce the behaviour
---------
PRE: Create named entity recognition annotation project (Sequence labelling). Upload dataset, create labels.
1. Annotate any random sample and move to the next one
2. Click on filter and select `Done` filter
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/4522842/158699185-3f80fd66-7ba0-4559-8a4d-aa033d8557b9.png)

Expected result: As for Text classification annotation project, the annotation count should decrease and not annotated sample should be shown.
Actual result: a blank page is shown and you cannot return to annotation mode even if you either refresh the page or click [Start annotation] again.
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/4522842/158699448-602c5dc6-008d-4a17-a368-1a7a2654f285.png)


Workaround:
1. Go to the `Application` console in browser
2. Local storage
3. Right-click on `checkpoint` key-value pair, `Edit Value`
4. Edit the entry `isChecked` from `true` to an empty string
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/4522842/158699777-d1982978-e52d-467a-88a7-f3b80309aebc.png)
5. Refresh the page and click on [Start annotation] again
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/4522842/158699970-423cad37-8dc4-4adc-98a3-da68b93b0119.png)


Your Environment
---------
*   Operating System: Linux (ubuntu), MacOS
*   Python Version Used: doccano docker python version
*   When you install doccano: 10 min ago, but can also reproduce on a version which is at least 3 month old.
*   How did you install doccano (Heroku button etc): docker
